title: Experience becoming a ninja for the day in Kyoto
text:
Experience becoming a ninja for the day in Kyoto Experience becoming a ninja for the day in Kyoto Details Category: Venues & Events   15:45 Visitors to historic Kyoto can experience becoming a ‘ninja’ for the day with a visit to the newly-opened Ninja Dojo and Store. Visitors are taught how to use shuriken and kunai (traditional throwing knives) and a host of ninja swords. 
Guests can don a selection of protective ninja clothing allowing wannabe ninjas to experience knife throwing on a traditional tatami mat. Those inspired by the experience can also choose to take memorabilia from the experience home with them, with a selection of clothing and swords available to purchase. The studio is open daily from 10:00am - 6:00pm. Related articles
